document_data.name: Mount Thargill
document_data.mainbody:
'''Mount Thargill''' was an extinct volcano and the easternmost peak of the [[Starspire Mountains]] in [[Tethyr]].

The ancient lava tube of Mt. Thargill was known as the [[Wyrmwell]]. It and the tunnels around it were used as one of the lairs for the [[Red dragon|red]] [[wyrm]] [[Balagos]]
